content: OMG I love this woman. her voice is so beautiful. I wish she would put a bit more passion in to it though. I am sure with time she will, she was probably nervous. The Song: "Memory" - By Susan Boyle "http://talent.itv.com/videos/video/item_200228.htm?intcmp=729064_123_1" Article: "http://new.music.yahoo.com/various-artists/news/unlikely-uk-sensation-boyle-sings-rousing-memory--61987270" A foot note: This little girl broke out in tears when she lost..I didn't watch the act but I hope whatever she does she makes it big in the UK.

content: Yes, she is very talented. She has a GREAT VOICE! I doubt the record industry will not sign her. Unfortunatly, appearance matters. Especially with female performers. Were it not for this double standard Joe Cocker would never have had a chance. Speaking of Joe cocker, Jay Leno mentioned last week it was Cocker's 65th birthday. Then added, the fact the man has always looked 65!
